        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    gr.addEncodedQuery('task.sys_class_name=dmn_demand_task^sla.sys_name=WF - Demand Task');
    gr.addQuery('task', current.sys_id);
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        gs.addInfoMessage('SLA Sys ID:' + " " + gr.sys_id);
        gs.addInfoMessage('Original Breach Time' + " " + gr.original_breach_time.getDisplayValue().split(' ')[0]);
    }

    //Check if within schedule
    var schedRec = new GlideRecord('cmn_schedule');
    var today = new GlideDateTime();
    schedRec.get('name', '8-5 weekdays');  

	//Trigger the Notification on the Breach Day

    var slaCreated = new GlideRecord('task_sla');
    slaCreated.addEncodedQuery('planned_end_timeONToday@javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()@javascript:gs.endOfToday()^task.sys_class_name=dmn_demand_task^sla.sys_name=WF - Demand Task^has_breached=true');
    slaCreated.addQuery('task', current.sys_id);
    slaCreated.setLimit(1);
    slaCreated.query();
    if (slaCreated._next()) {
        if (gr.has_breached && sched.isInSchedule(new GlideDateTime())) { //First Mail

        } else {
            while (!sched.isInSchedule(today)) {
                today.addDaysLocalTime(1); //this will keep on adding days unless it is weekday
            }
            gs.print(today); //with this method you can schedule notification which will trigger on next working day.
        }
    }






})(current, previous);]]></script>
